import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { clearItems } from '../redux/slices/cartSlice' import {selectCart} from '../redux/slices/cartSlice' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import CartItem from '../components/CartItem' import CartEmpty from '../components/CartEmpty' const Cart:React.FC = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { totalPrice, items } = useSelector(selectCart) const totalCount = items.reduce((sum:number, item: number) => sum + item.count, 0) const onClickClear = () => { if (window.confirm('Do you want to clear the cart?')) dispatch(clearItems()) } if (!totalCount) { return } return (
